reviews.review:
Spoiler Review!!!

What I like most about this movie is how Joe and Anthony Russo managed to balance this movie with its gigantic scale. We have almost 25 or more character and they had enough screen time to make the characters shine on their own way.

The characterization in this movie really relies on what the past Marvel movies has made except Thanos. Avengers Infinity War really feels like a Thanos movie than Avengers movie, and that is a good thing. What also made this movie a great movie is mosly Thanos, his motivations are clear and somewhat understandable. One must say that his motivation is almost poetic. While everyone is giving the praise for the writing, Josh Brolin performance as the big purple villain is something to be praised for.

Avengers Infinity War is a movie that really understands  how to balance its characters and the tone of the film. Infinity War broke expectations and made bold choices.

NEGATIVE
The phasing can be dragging at some points
I don't like that Bruce Banner/Hulk subplot
Team Cap was underused
CGI on Bruce in Hulkbuster is noticeable
Team Cap and Team Tony didn't meet
There's no Airport Batlle-esque sequence (the action sequences are still really good though)

Infinity War is great movie. Real stakes. Good Villains. Powerful Ending, Great Characters.
What more can we ask for. Marvel somewhat manages to make it work.

The fact that this only has 84% from critics just goes to show why critics are useless. This blows away every previous Marvel movie in my opinion and maybe only comparable to Thor 3 as the best Marvel movie in recent releases. The best villain from any Marvel movies thus far and great mix of emotion, comedy and action. See this movie ASAP!

Avengers: Infinity War is the best movie I've ever seen. Beautiful visual effects, outstanding performances, amazing story, amazing soundtrack, very unexpecting, great action sequences, marvelous chemistry!!! Thanos is the best MCU villain ever and best villain of all! Loved the movie so much to Infinity. I've been waiting 4 years for this, and it does not disappoint. Favorite MCU film, Marvel film and favorite movie ever! Such a masterpiece, can't wait to see what happens next year in Avengers 4!

10/10
Saw it twice and still think it's my favorite MCU film, possibly my all time favorite film.  The test of time will tell.
THIS MOVIE WAS AMAZING!10/10 !! you must see it. Marvel is making money moves and are coming up HUGE with this movie. just wish the new star wars were doing just as good

This movie should be called Infinite Racism, the first character to die in this film was a black man (Asgard Eye), the last person in the film to die was also a black man (Samuel Jackson, Shield). Every black person with super powers died (including Black Panther). A shameful film following Marvels previous works.
Incre√≠ble, bien hilada,todo se resuelve y te deja esperando por mas. Thanos es maravilloso,el desarrollo de personajes se redimen totalmente.

It was Intense the best marvel movie over the last 10 years!
The russo brothers directed this movie they said no spoilers. So I won't spoiler it. I have to say this you have to see this movie in IMAX 3D!! It's Awsome!!! I give it 5/5 stars.

Marvel and the Russo brothers really nailed this. It had to be great if it were to live up to expectations, and it is and it does. Saw it in IMAX and it was a great experience, sold out crowd really got into it. At times there was cheering and yelling, at times you could hear a pin drop.

I JUST SEEN  AVENGERS: INFINITY WAR  AND I WASN'T IMPRESSED. THIS FROM SOMEONE WHO HAS SEE 15 OF THE 18 MARVEL MOVIES. IT WAS FULL OF CORNY JOKES DIDN'T FIT THE TONE TEH MOVIES WAS GOING FOR A ND WAS ANNOYING TO ME  MORE THAN ANYTHING, CHEESYMOMENTS TOO, AND THEMOMENT THAT WERE MEANT TO BE IMPACTFUL WEREN'T! NOT THE DEATHS OR ANYTHING. THERE WERE ALSO WRITING CLICHES. I  HONESTLY EXPECTED MORE FROM THIS MARVEL BOMSHELL. HOPEFULLY PART TWO IS BETTER!
